text: I tell you, unless your moral rightness5:20 “Moral rightness”: Literally, “righteousness.” However, this term is little used in general non-church language and so in this translation it is replaced with phrases such as “those who live right” or “those who do good/right” etc. This is more than being correct, it means living a life that is morally right. is more than that of the religious teachers and the Pharisees, you can never enter the kingdom of heaven.
